title: mi vida loca in l.a.
name: mi vida loca in l.a.
description:
A Map by Dvd

native angeleno (yes, we do exist!!). my fav spots all around town.

properties.name: 4100 bar
properties.description: Posted by Dvd4100 Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CAone of my fav bars in la. great juke box and nice bartenders.

properties.name: Liquid Kitty
properties.description: Posted by Dvd11780 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, CALiquid Kitty (310) 473-3707

properties.name: Rooftop Bar at the Standard
properties.description: Posted by Dvd550 S Flower St, Los Angeles, CARooftop Bar at the Standard (213) 892-8080

properties.name: arroyo chop house
properties.description: Posted by Dvd536 S. Arroyo Pkwy, Pasadena, CAaged meat may sound gross, but it\'s soooo good. bill can easlily add up since everything on the menu is a la carte.

properties.name: babita mexicuisine
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1823 S. San Gabriel Blvd, San Gabriel, CAmy fav mexican restaurant!! homey spot that serves gourmet versions of traditional dishes. don\'t be fooled by the location and interior...it\'s not as cheap as it looks, but so worth it. everything on the menu is great. entrees: 5-0 try: jamaica drink, calamari, chiles en nogada

properties.name: bean town coffee bar
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 45 N. Baldwin Ave., Sierra Madre, CAgreat coffee shop in a cute neighborhood. boardgames and wi-fi...score.

properties.name: bistro k
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1000 Fremont Ave, South Pasadena, CAastonishing, inexpensive french delicacies served in a charming bungalow. everything on the menu is great. 0 minimum/person

properties.name: border grill
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1445 4th St, Santa Monica, CAgreat place for happy hour!! great mojitos and bar bites (). happy hour: weekdays 4pm-7pm late night happy hour: fri/sat after 10pm

properties.name: buster's coffee and ice cream shop
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  1006 Mission St, South Pasadena, CAfav place to grab a coffee on a sunday afternoon with my dog while enjoying live jazz. sandwiches are surprisingly good.

properties.name: cat & fiddle pub
properties.description: Posted by Dvd6530 Sunset Blvd, Hollywood, CAgreat place to chill on a summer night. the patio is great and the drinks are cheap. food is suprisingly good and the crowd is always a good mix. cover on fri/sat sucks, but worth it.

properties.name: cha cha lounge
properties.description: Posted by Dvd2375 Glendale Blvd, Los Angeles, CAkitchy tiki bar with a mexican twist....sombreros, marionette puppets and pinatas all over the place. interesting vending machine.

properties.name: chateau marmont
properties.description: Posted by Dvd8221 W. Sunset Blvd, West Hollywood, CA 90046simply fabulous..haha..you\'re almost always guarenteed to see a celeb, but that\'s not the main draw. the outdoor patio, lighting, staff and risotto balls are the best!! but beware the cocktail prices.....5-20!!

properties.name: clear
properties.description: Posted by Dvd11916 Ventura Blvd, Studio City, CAsleek bar in the valley. great place when you want a change of scenery.

properties.name: cliff's edge
properties.description: Posted by Dvd3626 Sunet Blvd, Los Angeles, CAsecluded garden oasis located next to the 99 cent store. great for brunch or a romantic dinner.

properties.name: colorado wine co.
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  2114 Colorado Blvd, Los Angeles, CAgood wine doesn\'t have to be expensive

properties.name: cuban bistro
properties.description: Posted by Dvd28 W. Main St, Alhambra, CAthe best sangria in town!! great place when you\'re in the mood for a nice dinner that\'s easy on the wallet. extensive cocktail menu. try: sangria, tortilla soup, guava chicken

properties.name: el arco iris
properties.description: Posted by Dvd   5684 York Blvd, Los Angeles, CAbest mango margaritas and fish tacos.

properties.name: euro pane
properties.description: Posted by Dvd950 E. Coloarado, Pasadena, CAgreat bakery. the best chocolate croissants!!

properties.name: fisherman's outlet
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 529 S Central Ave, Los Angeles, CAgreat seafood. the best crab salad ever!!

properties.name: footsies
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  2640 N Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CAchill dive bar in highland park. great juke box

properties.name: fosselman's ice cream co
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1824 W. Main St, Alhambra, CAold fashioned ice cream that\'s 16% butterfat...yum. try the spumoni.

properties.name: golden deli vietnamese
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 815 W. Las Tuans Dr, San Gabriel, CAbest vietnamese and value in LA. hits the spot when you\'re hungover. be prepared to wait for a table. imperial rolls are soooo good.

properties.name: green papaya
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1800 W. Valley Blvd., Alhambra, CAgood thai food and reasonable prices. looks like it used to be a burger king before. most dishes .50.

properties.name: heirloom cafe and bakery
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  807 Meridian Ave., South Pasadena, CAgreat place to get breakfast or lunch. baked goods are average. best egg salad sandwich!!

properties.name: la abeja
properties.description: Posted by Dvd   3700 N Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CAfeels like mexico. super cheap and super good. hits the spot after a night of drinking. most dishes under . cash only.

properties.name: library alehouse
properties.description: Posted by Dvd2911 Main St, Santa Monica, CAgreat place to try a new beer. only bar on main st worth checkin out.

properties.name: library bar
properties.description: Posted by Dvd630 W. 6th St, Los Angeles, CAchill bar with a great jukebox. good selection of beers on tap. would avoid during happy hour.

properties.name: literati cafe
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  12081 Wilshire Blvd, los angeles, ca 90025great lunch and coffee spot on the west side.

properties.name: little bar lounge
properties.description: Posted by Dvd757 S. La Brea Ave, Los Angeles, CAlow-key beer and soju bar. you can bring food or order delivery fm local restaurants.

properties.name: luna park
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 672 S. La Brea Ave, Los Angeles, CAgreat place for comfort food. best nicoise salad!!! most entrees 6-25.

properties.name: magnolia
properties.description: Posted by Dvd6266 1/2 W. Sunset Blvd, Hollywood, CAhip lounge with great food.

properties.name: mao's kitchen
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1512 Pacific Ave, Venice, CAgreat healthy chinese food. brown rice and whole wheat noodles available. good place for vegetarians. most dishes -. open til 3am on fri/sat

properties.name: match
properties.description: Posted by Dvd4657 Lankershim Blvd, North Hollywood, CAcalifornia cool lounge easily overlooked on a street filled with car dealerships.

properties.name: michelangelo pizzeria
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1637 Silver Lake Blvd, Los Angeles, CAcozy italian spot with great pasta and fresh mozzarella. love the pink and vodka sauces.

properties.name: nbc seafood
properties.description: Posted by Dvd404 S. Atlantic Blvd, Monterey Park, CAfav place for dim sum in LA. gets pretty busy on weekends and parking can be a bitch.

properties.name: paru's
properties.description: Posted by Dvd5140 W. Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CAbest vegetarian indian food.

properties.name: pete's cafe and bar
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 400 S Main St, Los Angeles, CAfood is so so, but the ambiance is so pretty. martinis are big and strong. nice place to chill on a summer night. almost makes you feel like you\'re in ny.

properties.name: philippe the original
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 1001 N. Alameda St, Los Angeles, CAthe best french dip sandwich!!!

properties.name: pink berry
properties.description: Posted by Dvd868 Huntley Dr, West Hollywood, CAcrack berry!! the green tea frozen yogurt is soooo good. be prepared to wait in a long line on weekends. more locations opening soon. :)

properties.name: porto's bakery
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 315 N. Brand Blvd, Glendale, CAcuban bakery and sandwich spot. everything is good and cheap...esp the cheese and guava struedal.

properties.name: red lion tavern
properties.description: Posted by Dvd2366 Glendale Blvd, Los Angeles, CAgreat german pub. spaten lager on tap!!

properties.name: sprinkles cupcakes
properties.description: Posted by Dvd9635 S. Santa Monica Blvd, Beverly Hills, CAbetter than magnolias in nyc!!! love the red velvet, strawberry and chai.

properties.name: susina bakery
properties.description: Posted by Dvd7122 Beverly Blvd, Los Angeles, CAberry blossom cake...the best!! 100x better than sweet lady jane.

properties.name: the dresden
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1760 N. Vermont Ave, Los Angeles, CAeveryone who lives in l.a. should check out marty and elayne at least once. fun lounge act. the place can get a bit crowded on the weekends. don\'t know about the food.

properties.name: the lobster
properties.description: Posted by Dvd1602 Ocean Ave, Santa Monica, CAmy fav seafood place in la. fine dining at a great price (entrees 0-0). best fish in town...much better than the water grill in my opinion. great view of the beach. try: halibut in lobster sauce (soooo good), sea bass, pepper crusted tuna...everything on the menu!!

properties.name: the sapphire
properties.description: Posted by Dvd11938 Ventura Blvd, Studio City, CAchill lounge with good music and bartenders. nice escape fm the usual hollywood scene.

properties.name: the well
properties.description: Posted by Dvd6255 Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CAchill place to get a drink during the week.

properties.name: the york
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  5018 York Blvd, Los Angeles, CAfav local bar. good food, interesting crowd, great drink prices and best of all, no attitude.

properties.name: tiki ti
properties.description: Posted by Dvd4427 W. Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CAfun hole-in-the-wall tiki bar. drinks may look fruity, but they pack a punch!! place gets crowded pretty quickly and the smoking allowed policy can be annoying. cash only.

properties.name: trader joe's
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 613 Mission St, South Pasadena, CAlove trader joes!!!

properties.name: trilussa restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 9601 Brighton Way, Beverly Hills, CAauthentic italian restaurant with reasonable prices. great food makes up for the bad service.

properties.name: veranda bar at the figueroa hotel
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 939 S. Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90015the bar selection sucks, but the chill maroccan/arizona poolside vibe makes up for it. so pretty on a warm summer night. cheap drinks and never crowded.

properties.name: yoshida sushi bar
properties.description: Posted by Dvd2026 Huntington Dr, san marino, cabest sushi on the east side for the price. sushi for purists, not a huge selection of fancy rolls. simply good fresh fish.

properties.name: zankou chicken
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 5065 W. Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CAso good and cheap

properties.name: zelo pizzeria
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 328 E. Foothill Blvd, Arcadia, CAcornmeal crust deep dish. yum. try the corn pizza.
